title: Dead Dreams Are Alive
author: Jasper Okedi
description: This is part of a poetry book series (Book 1). All my poetry is to empower each member of the family unit to fulfill their individual roles. The man is called to be the Provider & Protector, as the woman is meant to be the Receiver, Nurturer & Encourager mainly.

title: LOVE & LAVENDER
author: Jasper Okedi
description: This is the first of a collection of a “ten poetry book series” of intimate expressions exchanged between Akim & Akipi. The masculine spirit of Akim sings from the position of leadership and security; The feminine spirit of Akipi sings as one in the anchoring of feminine submission.

title: SOULS SOLILOQUY
author: Dominari Publishing
description: Dive into the inaugural issue of 'Souls Soliloquy,' a literary magazine by Dominari Publishing. This edition features a curated selection of contemporary poetry, short stories, and thought-provoking essays from emerging and established writers. Explore themes of identity, resilience, and the human experience through diverse voices and perspectives. 'Souls Soliloquy' is your gateway to discovering fresh literary talent and engaging narratives that resonate with the soul.
